channel.title: [Dice command to 317]
channel.description: Can anyone please help me to add ::dice command to the server please.

item.title: [Dice command to 317]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Pandora7, post:9, topic:529632”]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("dice") && c.issDonator == 1){ if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("Er, it's not to smart to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } if (c.playerRights == 1) { c.forcedText = "I'm Not A Donor+, So Im Not Legit Enough to dice!"; c.startAnimation(2769); c.sendMessage("You Must Donate to be A Legit Dicer"); } c.forcedText = "["+ c.playerName +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; }[/quote]That wouldn’t help him fix his 100 errors, it’s basically identical to the code that he posted. The missing bracket is probably from a line above/below where he c&p it in.

Read full topic

item.title: [Dice command to 317]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“sab670, post:6, topic:529632”]Could Someone please help me to add it normaly like that guy showed because when i add it i get 100 errors from compiler

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“dice”)) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“Er, it’s not to smart to do this in the Wilderness.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
c.forcedText = “I’m Not A Donor+, So Im Not Legit Enough to dice!”;
c.sendMessage(“You Must Donate to be A Legit Dicer”);
}
c.forcedText = “[”+ c.playerName +"] Just Rolled “+ Misc.random(100) +” On The Dice!";
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
}[/quote]The 100 errors is usually attributed to a missing opening or closing bracket.

Read full topic

item.title: [Dice command to 317]
item.dc:creator: @sab670 sab670
item.description:
@sab670 wrote:

Could Someone please help me to add it normaly like that guy showed because when i add it i get 100 errors from compiler

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“dice”)) {
if(c.inWild()) {
c.sendMessage(“Er, it’s not to smart to do this in the Wilderness.”);
return;
}
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
c.forcedText = “I’m Not A Donor+, So Im Not Legit Enough to dice!”;
c.sendMessage(“You Must Donate to be A Legit Dicer”);
}
c.forcedText = “[”+ c.playerName +"] Just Rolled “+ Misc.random(100) +” On The Dice!";
c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true;
c.updateRequired = true;
}

item.title: [Dice command to 317]
item.dc:creator: @LunarParadise LunarParadise
item.description:
@LunarParadise wrote:

There are many revisions of this, here is the one that I use:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("dice")) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("Er, it's not to smart to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } if (c.playerRights == 0) { c.forcedText = "I'm Not A Donor+, So Im Not Legit Enough to dice!"; c.sendMessage("You Must Donate to be A Legit Dicer"); } c.forcedText = "["+ c.playerName +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; }

You could do little changes like add && if c.playerRights == 3 etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [Dice command to 317]
item.dc:creator: @penguinimp penguinimp
item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

most basic command i’ve ever written.

Delta.

if (command.startsWith("dice")) {
    yell(playerName+" Rolled: "+misc.random(99)+1);
}

Tells every player on the server what you rolled.
roll is based on 1-100
